ai-patthana16.34:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.34:0.3_0: Talking for the sake of (permission) from time to time,
ai-patthana16.34:1.1_0: Because of this teaching it doesn’t give rise to the cause, and the reason for that.
ai-patthana16.34:2.1_0: for the sake of decrease, not including the teaching, without cause,
